call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Community Chat - October 9th

decisions.decision: Started the Raiders group on Telegram for coordinated Twitter promotion
decisions.speaker: Aberg
decisions.context: To organize community marketing efforts through coordinated raids on Twitter posts
decisions.quote: So we started with the Raiders group on Telegram. And we're growing, I would say, reasonably fast.

commitments.commitment: Create a Google Drive link for public promotional content
commitments.quote: I'm going to create a Google Drive link, which is going to be public, where we can upload promotional content for Ergo.

commitments.commitment: Work on simplifying content for non-technical people and post to Google Drive
commitments.quote: And then I'm going to work on simplifying some content for non-technical people as well, such as myself. And I'm going to be posting that onto the Google Drive link.

commitments.commitment: DM schedule to facilitate meeting with Mark from Kraken
commitments.quote: Oh, so I'm flexible. Yeah. So this month I'm flexible till 26. Yeah.

commitments.commitment: Give Aberg delegate access to main Ergo Twitter account
commitments.quote: Aberg, I'm going to give you some delegate access later today. After I look at your profile, make sure you're not a crazy.

open_questions.question: What's needed to update current Oracle to the new one
open_questions.context: Discussion about Oracle pool updates and compatibility

open_questions.question: How to reward the most active members in the Raiders group
open_questions.context: Discussion about incentivizing participation in Twitter raids

key_facts.fact: New parameter for number of sub-blocks per block to be used in upcoming sub-blocks protocol is now workable by miners
key_facts.speaker: Kushti

key_facts.fact: Sub-blocks parameter requires 50% miner votes to change, similar to block size
key_facts.speaker: Kushti

key_facts.fact: Sub-blocks parameter can be changed by absolute value of one sub-block up or down per epoch
key_facts.speaker: Kushti

key_facts.fact: Raiders group has grown to 20 members
key_facts.speaker: Aberg

key_facts.fact: Twitter raids run for 15 minutes with set targets for likes, reposts, and replies
key_facts.speaker: Aberg

key_facts.fact: Anarkapulko conference will be in late February 2026 in Acapulco, Mexico
key_facts.speaker: Kushti

key_facts.fact: February weather in Acapulco averages 86 to 74 degrees Fahrenheit
key_facts.speaker: qx()
